metadata.description: A gleaming metropolis built on the ruins of an ancient city, New Erebo shines with a sterile light. Towering spires and crystal domes pierce the smog-choked sky, their reflections rippling in the black glass canals.
metadata.significance: The seat of power for Wewew's tyrannical government, New Erebo is a symbol of progress and oppression. Its inhabitants live in constant surveillance, their every move monitored by the omnipresent 'Erebian Eye'.
